Bid price: %myBid% Adena
Closing date: %auctionEnd%

Raising a bid is only possible after a bid has been made. Canceled bids will be refunded, minus the transaction tax ( 10% of the bid price ).
You can raise or cancel a bid by selecting "My Auction" in the top menu.
